Detailed Description

Directory iterator implementation for root storage device.

Class RootDirectoryIteratorImp implements the directory iterator for the root storage device.

Member Function Documentation

DirectoryIterator & RootDirectoryIteratorImp::AtomicIncrement (   )  [protected, virtual]
 

Increments the iterator to point to the next pathname in the directory and returns a reference to itself. This increment operation does not consider the filter set on construction. Only valid iterators are allowed to be incremented. If this method gets called on the end iterator an assertion holds.

Returns:
Reference to itself incremented to point to the next pathname or to the root pathname signaling the end iterator.

Implements DirectoryIterator.

File::Error RootDirectoryIteratorImp::GetLastError (   )  const [virtual]
 

Returns the error occurred by the last operation.

Reimplemented from DirectoryIterator.

void RootDirectoryIteratorImp::Increment (   )  [virtual]
 

Since we delegate the iteration to the storages devices they also do the filtering for us. We don't have to filter again.

Reimplemented from DirectoryIterator.
